New Records: Buddy Hield broke his own record for most made threes in the first five games with a new team in NBA history
Key Match Events: Buddy Hield made a buzzer-beating three-pointer to close the first half
Draymond Green scored eight straight points in the second quarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Warriors won back-to-back games against the Pelicans
Others: Lindy Waters III got his first career start as a Warrior
